fn.p: Edited by: Miika Kaleva Arvonen, Kuopio University Hospital, Finland

Reviewed by: Audrey Dionne, Harvard Medical School, United States; Nagib Dahdah, CHU Sainte-Justine, Canada; Toru Watanabe, Niigata City General Hospital, Japan; Dirk Van Gysel, Onze Lieve Vrouwziekenhuis Hospital, Belgium
This article was submitted to Pediatric Infectious Diseases, a section of the journal Frontiers in Pediatrics
